alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:00PM CDT until May 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL PALO PINTO COUNTY... At 858 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Palo Pinto, or 15 miles southwest of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Palo Pinto around 910 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
